languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Burst{/g} attacks with this bolt pistol cost +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} more. After firing a burst attack, {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attacks with this bolt pistol gain +50% to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}Burst{/g} attacks with this bolt pistol cost +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} more. After firing a burst attack, {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single-shot{/g} attacks with this bolt pistol gain +50% to damage until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} stacks.

{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Burst{/g} attacks with this bolt pistol cost +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} more. After firing a burst attack, {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attacks with this bolt pistol gain +50% to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks.

languages.text: 这把爆矢手枪的{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}射击消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}提高1点。连发射击结束之后，所有{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}单发{/g}射击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}都会提高50%，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果可叠加。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Burst{/g} attacks with this bolt pistol cost +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} more. After firing a burst attack, {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attacks with this bolt pistol gain +50% to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks.

traits.locale_text: 这把爆矢手枪的{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}连发{/g}射击消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}提高1点。连发射击结束之后，所有{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}单发{/g}射击造成的伤害都会提高50%，效果持续至战斗结束。此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}可叠加。

languages.text: このボルトピストルによる{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト{/g}攻撃のコストは{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が+1される。バースト攻撃後、ボルトピストルによる{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}単発攻撃{/g}は、戦闘終了までさらに{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}の+50%を得る。この効果 はスタックする。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Burst{/g} attacks with this bolt pistol cost +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} more. After firing a burst attack, {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attacks with this bolt pistol gain +50% to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks.

traits.locale_text: このボルトピストルによる{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}連射{/g}攻撃のコストは{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が+1される。連射攻撃後、ボルトピストルによる{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}単発攻撃{/g}は、戦闘終了時までさらにダメージの50％を得る。この{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}はスタックする。

languages.text: Атаки {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g} из этого болт-пистолета требуют на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} больше. После стрельбы очередью {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}одиночные{/g} выстрелы наносят на 50% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Burst{/g} attacks with this bolt pistol cost +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} more. After firing a burst attack, {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attacks with this bolt pistol gain +50% to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks.

traits.locale_text: Атаки {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}очередью{/g} из этого болт-пистолета требуют на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} больше. После стрельбы очередью {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}одиночные выстрелы{/g} наносят на 50% больше урона до конца боя. {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Эффект{/g} суммируется.

Атаки {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}очередью{/g} из этого болт-пистолета требуют на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} больше. После стрельбы очередью {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}одиночные выстрелы{/g} наносят на 50% больше урона до конца боя. {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Эффект{/g} суммируется.

languages.text: Los ataques de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g} con esta pistola bólter cuestan +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Tras disparar un ataque de ráfaga, los ataques de {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}un solo disparo{/g} con esta pistola bólter ganan +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} hasta el final del combate. Este efecto es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Burst{/g} attacks with this bolt pistol cost +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} more. After firing a burst attack, {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attacks with this bolt pistol gain +50% to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks.

traits.locale_text: Los ataques de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}ráfaga{/g} con esta pistola bólter cuestan +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Tras disparar un ataque de ráfaga, los ataques de {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}un solo disparo{/g} con esta pistola bólter ganan +50 % de daño hasta el final del combate. Este {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} es acumulativo.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salvenangriffe{/g} mit dieser Boltpistole kosten +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} mehr. Nach dem Abschuss eines Salvenangriffs erlangen {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Einzelschussangriffe{/g} mit dieser Boltpistole +50 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes. Dieser Effekt addiert sich.

After firing a burst attack, {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attacks with this bolt pistol gain +50% to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}Salvenangriffe{/g} mit dieser Boltpistole kosten +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} mehr. Nach dem Abschuss eines Salvenangriffs erlangen {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Einzelschussangriffe{/g} mit dieser Boltpistole +50 % Schaden bis zum Ende des Kampfes. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} addiert sich.

languages.text: Les attaques {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}en rafale{/g} menées à l'aide de ce pistolet bolter coûtent +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} de plus. Après une attaque en rafale, les attaques {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}au coup par coup{/g} portées à l'aide de ce pistolet bolter bénéficient de +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cet effet est cumulable.

After firing a burst attack, {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attacks with this bolt pistol gain +50% to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat.
